TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HideDisabledControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 为关联的 Web 控件提供呈现功能，以修改特定浏览器的默认标记或行为。

span.span: Provides rendering capabilities for the associated Web control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类改编关联的控件, 以修改特定浏览器的默认标记或行为。 The class adapts the associated control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser. 可以扩展类, 进一步自定义控件的呈现。You can extend the class to further customize rendering of the control. 适配器是 .NET Framework 组件进行编译的, 这些组件在页面或控件的生命周期中执行一个或多个阶段。Adapters are compiled .NET Framework components that take over one or more stages in the life cycle of a page or control. 扩展类将提供对控件的生命周期阶段的访问。 Extending the class will provide access to the life-cycle stages of the control. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)). 适配器的初始请求会导致 .NET Framework 根据请求的浏览器的特征, 搜索控件的映射适配器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 浏览器定义文件由类用来标识客户端浏览器的特征并将适配器映射到浏览器类型。Browser definition files are used by the class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)). 有关 ASP.NET 的自适应呈现体系结构和演示如何实现控件适配器并将其映射到控件的分步演练的说明, 请参阅 "创作 ASP.NET 服务器控件适配器:MSDN Library 中的简介, 网址[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)为。For a description of the adaptive rendering architecture of ASP.NET and a step-by-step walkthrough that shows how to implement a control adapter and map it to a control, see "Authoring ASP.NET Server Control Adapters: An Introduction" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类以显示处于启用状态和禁用状态的控件。The following code example shows how to extend the class to display a control in an enabled and disabled state. 此示例包含三个部分:This example contains three parts: - 从类派生的适配器。An adapter derived from the class. - 包含控件和设备特定内容的 .aspx 文件。The .aspx file that incorporates the control and device-specific content. - 用于将适配器链接到设备类型的浏览器文件。A browser file to link the adapter to a device type. 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展该类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特定于设备的内容声明控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control with device-specific content. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/implcs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/implvb.aspx#3)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将控件链接到 Windows CE .net 上运行的浏览器的自定义适配器。The following code example shows how to link the control to the custom adapter for browsers running on Windows CE .NET.

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 构造类的实例。The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the class. 适配器的初始请求会导致 .NET Framework 根据请求的浏览器的特征, 搜索控件的映射适配器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到后, 控件在其属性中保存对映射的适配器实例的引用。Once found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property. 有关适配器映射和浏览器定义文件的信息, 请参阅[自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For information on adapter mappings and browser definition files, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含可生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法的 。

span.span: The containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 将关联的 Web 控件以 HTML 格式写入到输出流中。

span.span: Writes the associated Web control to the output stream as HTML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联的控件以 HTML 形式写入输出流。 The method writes the associated control to the output stream as HTML. 默认情况下, .NET Framework 在 Web 服务器控件自己的方法上调用。By default, the .NET Framework calls on the Web server control's own method. 但是, 一旦设置了该控件的属性, .NET Framework 就会对关联控件的该属性执行该事件的适配器实现。However, once the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will execute the adapter's implementation of the event over that of the associated control. 事件用于对呈现到设备浏览器的标记代码进行修改。The event is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 控件属性应该在生命周期的此阶段之前设置, 而只是在此处完成的控件的实际标记创建。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 在生命周期的此阶段对控件所做的更改不会保存到视图状态。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 若要保存对控件所做的更改, 请重写事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event. 此事件还允许派生类处理事件, 而无需附加委托, 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选方法。The event also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法, 以便在启用关联的控件时将对象传递给父控件以呈现。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to pass the object to the parent control for rendering if the associated control is enabled. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.vb#2)]
